question: People can live and work anywhere they want to choose because of improved communication technology and transport. Do the advantages of this development outweigh disadvantages?
text: The technology and transportation has become the most crucial thing in people's life. They can communicate or even travelling because of the improvement of machinery and shipping. There are several advantages and a few disadvantages about the shipping and telecommunication.

On the one hand, there are a few advantages about the improvement of automatic and transport. Firstly, because of the development in  technology, people can communicate easily from a specific place to others, so, it will help them to talk to each other from afar. Thus, they can choose any places that they want to work at. Furthermore, the transportation has developed a lot, which help people go from a country to others easily. So, when people need to travel it will help save much of their time.

On the other hand, even the benefits have a lot of aspects, there are also several disadvantages. Firstly, as the automation improves it cost more money to buy it because the machine that is used in the high-tech is becoming more expensive. For instance, one of the most popular brand, Apple, a few years ago, this phone cost very cheap, but nowadays this brand is one of the most expensive phone in the world. Moreover, the enhancement of transport makes more pollution to the earth. This is because this transit uses a lot of gasoline, which is bad for the environment.
In conclusion, the enhancement of telecommunication and transit give us many advantages because it makes our life become easier and also more efficient
